Module it.polimi.ingsw.PSP47
Package it.polimi.ingsw.PSP47.Model

Class Game

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.PSP47.Model.Game
public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
This class contains all the elements of a game.

      public void putChallengerAtLastPosition()

    • createNewPlayersList

      public void createNewPlayersList​(java.lang.String chosenPlayer)
      This method replaces the ArrayList players with a new ArrayList with the players in the order chosen by the Challenger (he decided the first player, then the order has to remains equal).
      Parameters:
      chosenPlayer - the player chosen by the Challenger to be first.

    • getPlayer

      public Player getPlayer​(java.lang.String username)
      This method returns the player who has a specific username.
      Parameters:
      username - the username that you want to found the correspondent player.
      Returns:
      the player instance.

    • removePlayer

      public void removePlayer​(Player player)

    • checkIfPlayersCanMoveUp

      public void checkIfPlayersCanMoveUp​(Player player)
      This method checks if the player who has just moved is Athena. If he is and if he has just moved up, he makes move up impossible to all the other players. If he hasn't moved up, the other players can. Otherwise, it does nothing.
      Parameters:
      player - the player who has just moved.

    • checkWinningCondition

      public boolean checkWinningCondition​(Worker currentWorker, Player currentPlayer)
      This method is called after every move. It checks if a player has just won the game. There are two cases: if there is a player with the Hera card there is another control in addition to check if the player has just move up in a third level. In fact, to win he must also not be on a perimeter slot of be Hera.
      Parameters:
      currentWorker - the worker that do the winning move.
      currentPlayer - the player who has just moved.
      Returns:
      true if the player has won, false otherwise.

    • checkWinningCondition

      public Player checkWinningCondition()
      This method is called after every build. It checks if a player has just won the game. It happens if there is a player with the Chronus card and if there are five complete towers on the board.
      Returns:
      the player who has won, null if no one won.

    • checkIfTheGodIsPresent

      private Player checkIfTheGodIsPresent​(GodName godName)
      This method checks if a god is present in the game and returns its player. Otherwise, it returns null.
      Parameters:
      godName - the god that must be checked
      Returns:
      the player who has the god, null if there isn't.

    • checkWhenPlayerIsDeleted

      public void checkWhenPlayerIsDeleted​(GodName godName)
      This method checks if there are any parameters which have to be reset if a specific god isn't part of the game anymore. In fact, if Athena is out of the game, all the players can always move up during their turns.
      Parameters:
      godName - the name of the god which has been deleted by the game.
